features: 72-HOUR NONSTOP PROTECTION: Degree Men Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant provides up to 72 hours of nonstop protection against sweat and body odor
MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY: Our breakthrough MotionSense technology works in sync with your body all day long. This deodorant for men releases a subtle burst of fragrance every time you move
READY FOR WHAT’S NEXT: Take on the day with Degree Men Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant stick. Simply twist, glide, and move
UNSTOPPABLE FRESHNESS: Stay fresh longer with this antiperspirant deodorant for men. Degree Men Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant features a refreshing woody scent to keep you feeling energized
RECYCLE WITH DEGREE: As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging
body.description: Every day is full of potential adventures. Don't let sweat and odor block you from finding it. Shield yourself from both with Degree Men Adventure Advanced Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick. Supercharged with 72-hour odor protection, this antiperspirant deodorant for men works as hard as you do and provides superior motion-activated protection from sweat and odor. With a rugged fragrance that blends clean citrus, energizing fresh pepper, and long-lasting notes of woods and musk, this Degree Men antiperspirant deodorant won't let you down – so you can stay fresh, for all the ways you move. Degree Men Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant features our breakthrough MotionSense technology that doesn't stop working no matter how much you move. It works with unique microcapsules that sit on the surface of your skin. This powerful antiperspirant deodorant for men responds when you need it most so that you can stay confident without having to worry about slowing down. Whether you're having a long day at work, playing sports, working out in the gym, or whatever the day throws at you, you can be confident you'll be protected from sweat and odor by this antiperspirant for men.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Degree Men Adventure Antiperspirant Deodorant has a rugged fragrance that blends clean citrus, energizing fresh pepper and long-lasting notes of wood and musk. Its powerful MotionSense technology releases more fragrance as you move, so that you're ready for the most challenging adventure.

72-HOUR NONSTOP SWEAT PROTECTION This antiperspirant stick delivers unstoppable sweat and odor protection that helps keep you moving with confidence. MOTIONSENSE TECHNOLOGY Degree's breakthrough MotionSense technology reacts directly to movement to keep you feeling fresh and protected. UNSTOPPABLE CONFIDENCE Degree doesn't stop working, no matter how much you move. MOVING TOGETHER TOWARD REUSE At Degree, we're committed to creating the most reused and inclusive products possible. As well as increasing our use of reusable materials, we’re making it easier for you to recycle our antiperspirant and dry spray packaging.

Degree Men UltraClear DeodorantStick 72 hour Sweat and odor Black+White, 2.7 oz Degree Men Advanced Cool Rush Antiperspirant Deodorant Dry Spray, 3.8 oz Degree Men Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant Stick, 2.7 oz Main Benefit This antiperspirant for men protects against white marks and yellow stains. Active lives need Degree Men UltraClear Black + White Antiperspirant Deodorant, formulated to help you move with freedom, and feel fresh and confident. Get the crisp, arctic freshness of our fan-favorite Cool Rush deodorant in a convenient dry spray featuring MotionSense technology that works with your body. Degree Men Extreme Blast Antiperspirant Deodorant provides 48-hour sweat and odor protection that won't let you down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really Nice Smell and Protection
reviews.reviewText: Since using the 72 hr protection, I’ve had no problem with b.o. This lasts for at least 48hrs on me even after strenuous activity. The smell is pleasant and not overwhelming imo. I’m really happy with the price too!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Saves your pits!
reviews.reviewText: I am absolutely thrilled with Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Adventure. This deodorant has become my go-to choice for reliable, long-lasting protection against sweat and odor, especially during my active lifestyle.First and foremost, the effectiveness of this deodorant is exceptional. The "Adventure" variant lives up to its name by providing superior protection even during intense physical activities and adventures. It keeps me feeling fresh and dry throughout the day, no matter what challenges I face.The long-lasting formula is a standout feature. I appreciate that I can apply it in the morning and trust that it will continue to provide protection well into the evening. It's perfect for those busy days when reapplication isn't convenient.The scent of Degree Men Adventure is both refreshing and invigorating. It has a clean and masculine fragrance that isn't overpowering but leaves a subtle, appealing scent that keeps me feeling confident.Moreover, the ease of application is excellent. The deodorant glides on smoothly and dries quickly without leaving a sticky or greasy residue. It doesn't stain clothing, which is a big plus.The durability of the deodorant's packaging ensures that it can withstand the rigors of daily use, whether it's in my gym bag, at the office, or during travel.In summary, Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Adventure is a must-have for active individuals seeking reliable protection against sweat and odor. Its effectiveness, long-lasting formula, and appealing scent make it an excellent choice. I am extremely satisfied with this deodorant, and it has become a trusted companion during my adventures and daily activities. I highly recommend it to anyone looking for a high-performance deodorant that keeps you feeling fresh and confident all day long.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great scent, long lasting, great value
reviews.reviewText: This is my daily deodorant. Subtle, nice scent. Long lasting and effective.Buying the 4 pk. is a Great value. You get 4 for the price of 2 at the grocery store

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Reliable Protection for Everyday Adventures
reviews.reviewText: The antiperspirant aspect is where this deodorant really shines. I'm an outdoorsy guy - I hike, bike, and am generally pretty active. I've used this deodorant on some pretty humid days, and it's kept me dry and comfortable throughout. No embarrassing sweat patches, which is a relief. And it doesn't leave those annoying white marks on my clothes, another big win.As for odor protection, it holds up pretty well there too. Even after a long day, I don't find myself needing to reapply. It's nice to know that I can put it on in the morning and not worry about it for the rest of the day.The stick form is easy to use and it doesn't go on too thick or greasy. Some deodorants feel heavy or sticky, but this one's pretty lightweight.In terms of value, the 4-pack is a good deal. It's more economical than buying single packs and means I don’t have to worry about running out for a while.Overall, I'm quite satisfied with the Degree Men Antiperspirant Deodorant Adventure. It's not a miracle product, but it does its job well. It's a reliable choice for anyone looking for a solid, no-fuss deodorant that can handle a bit of sweat and adventure.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Found my favorite scent finally. It smells a little sweet and bold with a fresh scent. It really does last for 3 days as long as you’re not getting extra sweaty everyday. It doesn’t feel heavy or cakey. Washes off easily with soap and water. No skin irritation and I e even gotten compliments on my “cologne” when I’m not wearing cologne. Smart pricing for a multipack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No stinky husband
reviews.reviewText: The deodorant arrived in perfect condition, not melted or missing as some reviews had mentioned. I opened them right away and they were great - smelled good and worked well. Definitely worth buying again, especially at such a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Been using Degree for over 20 years and it's the same formula as before. Great deodorant that keeps you dry all day in comfort.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Works really well, you could even skip a day and still smell good. I'm a large man and it was great! No complaints, from co workers or family
Kein Schweiß, kein Geruch, gar nichts. Funktioniert genau so wie es soll!
I sweat a lot and nothing worked out for me. But this product is just AMAZING

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 6, 2022
reviews.reviewText: This smells a little like dove soap, however I would rather that than smelly armpits! I've not found one until now that can give a clean scent throughout a mega busy 12 hour shift. This one still smells just as fresh when you get home from work as to when you leave. In comparison to others like the 48 hour more expensive sure ones, which are good and work for about 8 hours this one is by far more impressive! The item itself arrived quickly and I'd also highly recommend the seller 🙂 will be buying more and recommending to others.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on April 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great Deodorant, I discovered this while staying in the USA, its gentle but extremely effective. I have sensitive skin and many products leave me itchy but this deodorant never never causes irritation on me. It is a little pricey but lasts ages and is very economical in use.Is delivered from the US came well before estimated delivery date.
